biography: Tracey Edmonds has created and produced groundbreaking projects for television, film, music, and digital media. She served as co-host of Extra TV alongside Mario Lopez and Charissa Thompson for 3 years, where she earned an Emmy Award. Edmonds currently serves as CEO and President of Edmonds Entertainment. She recently inked a First-Look Production and Development Deal with STXalternative. Edmonds is also the Founder and Editor of the new lifestyle, health and wellness media brand, AlrightNow.com.
name: Tracey Edmonds
